ProductInfo.Features:
Intel® Core i5-3230M Processor (3MB cache and processor speed up to 3.2GHz with Turbo Boost) / 8GB DDR3 1600MHz memory (16GB Max) / 750GB HDD (5400rpm, Serial ATA) / Double-layer DVD±RW/CD-RW
15.6" widescreen HD TruBrite LED Backlit display with Intel® Wireless Display Technology (Display Resolution: 1366x768, 16:9 aspect ratio, Supports 720p content) / Intel Integrated Graphics (64MB-1696MB dynamically allocated shared graphics memory) / Buttonless touchpad with Windows 8 gesture support
HD Webcam and Microphone / Intel® Centrino® Wireless-N 2200, 2x2 BGN / 10/100 Ethernet LAN /  6-Cell Li-Ion Battery / Click pad pointing device with multi-touch control, One Touch Function Keys, Premium Raised Tile LED backlit Keyboard with 10-Keypad (black)
Memory Card Reader / 4 USB 3.0 Ports (2-USB (3.0) ports, 2-USB (3.0) ports with Sleep and Charge) / HDMI output port / RGB port / Headphone jack (stereo), Microphone input port with Sleep and Music / Microphone jack (mono) / SRS Premium Sound 3D / harman/kardon stereo speakers
Microsoft Windows 8 64-bit operating system / Weighs 5.4 lbs. and measures just 1.2" thin / Energy Star Qualified / Manufacturer warranty (1-Yr Parts and Labor, 1-Year Battery)
ProductInfo.Name: Toshiba Satellite 15.6" Laptop - 3rd Gen Intel® Core i5-3230 processor - 8GB Memory - 750GB Hard Drive - Backlit keyboard - Windows 8 - Prestige Silver
